void FWSetLogLevel ( FWLogLevel  value)

Set log level

Parameters
value
  • FW_LOG_LEVEL_INFO Default value
  • FW_LOG_LEVEL_QUIET
  • FW_LOG_LEVEL_VERBOSE force the verbose log in both debug & release version
void FWSetUncaughtExceptionHandler ( NSUncaughtExceptionHandler *  handler)

AdManager registers NSSetUncaughtExceptionHandler() to report uncaught exception. If app needs to perform last-minute logging before the program terminates, use this function instead of NSSetUncaughtExceptionHandler.

Parameters
handler

Returns
an id<FWAdManager>
